name: YouTube Video Downloader
description: Download videos from YouTube in your preferred quality.
longDescription: This script allows you to download videos from YouTube by providing a URL. You can select your preferred video quality, and the video will be downloaded to your specified location. If the requested quality is not available, the script will list available qualities. VERY IMPORTANT: Open the video using more advanced media players like VLC or MPC-HC to ensure proper playback.
author: ScriptHub

parameters.name: url
parameters.label: YouTube URL:
parameters.description: The URL of the YouTube video you want to download

parameters.name: output-path
parameters.label: Output path:
parameters.description: The full path where the video should be saved, including filename
